questions.question: What does abstraction hide?
questions.explanation: Abstraction simplifies by hiding unnecessary details.

questions.question: What class cannot be instantiated?
questions.explanation: Abstract classes serve as templates only.

questions.question: What method has no implementation?
questions.explanation: Abstract methods define contracts without code.

questions.question: What keyword declares abstract classes in Java?
What defines contracts without implementation?
questions.explanation: Interfaces specify what classes must do.

questions.question: What keyword applies interfaces to classes?
questions.explanation: Implements keyword connects interfaces to classes.

questions.question: What must child classes do with abstract methods?
questions.explanation: Child classes must define abstract method bodies.

questions.question: How many interfaces can Java classes implement?
What Python module provides abstract base classes?
questions.explanation: ABC module enables abstraction in Python.

questions.question: What benefit does abstraction provide?
questions.explanation: Abstraction makes systems easier to understand.
